name: DRDots
description:
DRCoderz' version of the classic dots-and-boxes, connect-the-dots, paper-and-pencil game comes to live with this great hand drawn theme, bringing back memories to those who used to play it with their friends at school during downtime. Same features as the real connect-the-dots game but with touch capabilities.

Take turns with your opponent (a second human player or the machine) by tapping on the two dots that will form the line, with the goal of filling a square. The one with more squares filled, wins the round.

Features:
-Realistic-looking theme, with hand drawn lines and dots over a piece of paper; squares are drawn by a pencil animation
-Pick your favorite color from 4 choices available
-Play against the machine (Single-Player mode) or against another human (Two-Player mode)
-Three field sizes (Small, Medium, Large)
-Three difficulty levels (Beginner, Intermediate, Advanced)
-Automatic game save after closing the application
-Restart game at any point
-Option of muting pencil sounds
